results.title: Yellen Confronts Russian Officials at G20 Meeting
results.abstract: In a private session, Treasury Secretary Janet L. Yellen said the Russians were “complicit in Putin’s atrocities,” according to remarks shared by a U.S. official.

results.title: R. Kelly Sentenced to 20 Years for Child Sex Crimes
results.abstract: The singer will serve most of the sentence in federal prison at the same time as a 30-year term for racketeering and sex trafficking.

media.caption: R. Kelly in 2019. He was convicted last year of coercing minors into sexual activity and producing sex tapes involving a minor.

results.title: Former Soldier Is Charged With Killing Pregnant Army Private 2 Decades Ago
results.abstract: Private Amanda Gonzales, 19, was on her first assignment in the Army when she was killed on a military base in Germany. A former soldier, arrested on Thursday, has been charged with her murder.

media.caption: Private Amanda Gonzales was excited that she was pregnant and planned to name the child Alicia Marie, her mother said.

results.title: East Palestine Crisis Tests a Trump-Backed Senator
results.abstract: J.D. Vance, the freshman senator from Ohio, is in the spotlight for the first time in his tenure as he responds to the train derailment and its aftermath.

media.caption: “I worry that unless we keep the pressure on the federal policymakers and the corporations that caused this problem,” Senator J.D. Vance said, “a lot of people are going to be forgotten and left behind.”

results.title: Crew Alerted to Problem Just Before Ohio Derailment, Investigators Say
results.abstract: The crew tried to slow down after an overheated wheel bearing set off an alarm, but 38 cars still ended up leaving the tracks, the National Transportation Safety Board said.

media.caption: The timing of when the crew was alerted to an overheated wheel bearing is a key issue in the investigation into the derailment in East Palestine, Ohio, this month.
